Elliot_Omega.initial: Meets Ch35 - horror of seeing his future, recognition of self
Elliot_Omega.power_dynamic: Omega has knowledge, Cross has agency in 'now'
Elliot_Omega.tension: Omega can't tell him everything due to causality rules - must guide indirectly
Elliot_Omega.evolution: By Ch55, they're thinking in sync - barely two separate people

Cassandra_Wright.initial: Divorced but unresolved - he calls when desperate
Cassandra_Wright.power_dynamic: Equal intellectually, but she's emotionally healthier
Cassandra_Wright.tension: She wants him to let go of determinism obsession; he can't because it's real
Cassandra_Wright.evolution: Reconnection through crisis, love persists across timelines

Dr_Marcus_Soren.initial: Soren finds Elliot, reveals cult's beliefs about him
Dr_Marcus_Soren.power_dynamic: Soren has resources and knowledge; Elliot has role Soren wants
Dr_Marcus_Soren.tension: Soren treats Elliot as prophet; Elliot rejects messianic role
Dr_Marcus_Soren.evolution: Alliance of necessity, mutual discomfort with deterministic fate

Agent_Maya_Reyes.initial: Hunter/prey - she's tracking him as threat
Agent_Maya_Reyes.power_dynamic: She has institutional power; he has temporal knowledge
Agent_Maya_Reyes.tension: Both trying to prevent timeline collapse, opposite methods
Agent_Maya_Reyes.evolution: Becomes ally when government faction tries to weaponize loop

Cassandra_Wright.initial: Recognition across time - she sees his pain from all loops
Cassandra_Wright.power_dynamic: She grounds him to linear time, he shows her what becomes of them
Cassandra_Wright.tension: In some loops she died saving Elliot - he mourns timelines she doesn't remember

Dr_Marcus_Soren.initial: Omega reveals Soren's cult is necessary for loop closure
Dr_Marcus_Soren.tension: Soren wants Omega to confirm his theology; Omega knows it's more complex

Agent_Maya_Reyes.initial: Reyes uses Cassandra to find Elliot
Agent_Maya_Reyes.power_dynamic: Reyes has authority, Cassandra has ethics
Agent_Maya_Reyes.tension: Cassandra protects Elliot, Reyes sees her as obstruction then ally
Agent_Maya_Reyes.evolution: Bond over both losing people to temporal mechanics

Dr_Marcus_Soren.initial: Academic rivals - Cassandra thinks he's crackpot, he dismisses her emotions
Dr_Marcus_Soren.power_dynamic: Both brilliant, different approaches to same problem

Agent_Maya_Reyes.initial: She's hunted his cult for years
Agent_Maya_Reyes.power_dynamic: Cat and mouse - he evades, she pursues
Agent_Maya_Reyes.tension: Law vs belief in higher purpose
Agent_Maya_Reyes.evolution: Temporary truce when both realize loop is destabilizing
